constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 188 (Tuesday, October 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MORELLE:
H.R. 5739.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H5932]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to change certain Federal Pell Grant requirements for certain students with disabilities, and for other purposes.
